text: Iavaŋ Hadi agaŋ kulaŋ iamɨgali limu hɨhɨle agɨladɨ lɨbɨmɨŋa abɨci nudɨ kulaŋ iamɨgali hɨnihɨdavi uamalɨ. Vɨkɨlɨ haman agɨlaŋ iakɨbalɨhavi agadɨ ala nɨbu nudɨ kulaŋ iamɨgali agɨlasaŋ hɨji lama vɨkɨlɨ agɨladɨ lɨci iaka hutesɨ ma hɨnibalɨhavi uamalɨ. Haman ma lɨci kulaŋ iamɨgali agɨlaŋ sɨkasɨkan sɨbɨlɨ lɨbalɨhavi uamalɨ.
